item.title: By: Sydney
item.dc:creator: Sydney
item.description: Hi, i have an accounts in met wallet but i can't no longer access it because i forgot my password and lost the sim card, it was not connected to my gmail account, so i wonder if i could still recover that account, its connected to my chamet and my earning has been transferred to that account sadly i wasn't able to withdraw it because i forgot my password. Is there anything i can do?
item.content:encoded: Hi, i have an accounts in met wallet but i can’t no longer access it because i forgot my password and lost the sim card, it was not connected to my gmail account, so i wonder if i could still recover that account, its connected to my chamet and my earning has been transferred to that account sadly i wasn’t able to withdraw it because i forgot my password. Is there anything i can do?

póngase en contacto con su servicio de atención al cliente
item.content:encoded:

póngase en contacto con su servicio de atención al cliente

item.title: By: Lina María Rojas Balanta

item.description: Mi cuenta de arripay está bloqueada será que pierdo mi plata
